sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section>
    <b-table
      v-sortable="sortableOptions"
      :data="data"
      @click="row => $toast.open(`Clicked ${row.first_name}`)"
    >
      <template slot-scope="props">
        <b-table-column field="order" label="#" width="40" numeric>
          {{ props.row.order }}
        </b-table-column>

        <b-table-column field="codigo" label="Código">
          {{ props.row.codigo }}
        </b-table-column>

        <b-table-column field="cliente" label="Cliente">
          {{ props.row.cliente }}
        </b-table-column>

        <b-table-column field="direccion" label="Dirección">
          {{ props.row.direccion }}
        </b-table-column>
      </template>
    </b-table>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import { BTable } from 'bootstrap-vue';
import draggable from 'vuedraggable';

const sortable = {
  name: 'sortable',
  bind(el, binding, vnode) {
    const table = el;
    // eslint-disable-next-line no-underscore-dangle
    table._sortable = draggable.createSortable(
      table.querySelector('tbody'),
      binding.value,
      vnode,
    );
  },
};

const items = [
  {
    isActive: true, age: 40, first_name: 'Dickerson', last_name: 'Macdonald',
  },
  {
    isActive: false, age: 21, first_name: 'Larsen', last_name: 'Shaw',
  },
  {
    isActive: false, age: 89, first_name: 'Geneva', last_name: 'Wilson',
  },
  {
    isActive: true, age: 38, first_name: 'Jami', last_name: 'Carney',
  },
];

export default {
  name: 'HelloWorld',
  props: ['tasks'],
  directives: { sortable },

  data() {
    return {
      items,
      sortableOptions: {
        chosenClass: 'is-selected',
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {},
  components: {
    BTable,
    draggable,
  },
};
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
.spacing {
  margin-top: 20px;
  margin-left: 10px;
}
</style>
